Enchantment 5

Awaken Hamadryad

Various nations(8)

Ritual
N4
spell id [id]: 203
effect number [effect_number]: 21

number of effects [nreff]: 1
gems required [gemcost]: 25N
Summon Commander:#3066 Hamadryad
Source Terrain : Forest
Hamadryads are tree-nymphs. They are wise and skilled in nature magic and protect the forests they inhabit. However seeking advice from a Hamadryad can be quite difficult as there is usually a flock of loud chattering harpies nesting among the branches of the Hamadryad.
